title: The Pianist (painting)
text:
The Pianist: Portrait of Stanley Addicks is an 1896 portrait by <a href="Thomas%20Eakins">Thomas Eakins</a>, <a href="List%20of%20works%20by%20Thomas%20Eakins">Goodrich #278</a>. The painting is in the permanent collection of the <a href="Indianapolis%20Museum%20of%20Art">Indianapolis Museum of Art</a>. 
Eakins also painted Addicks's wife, Weda Cook, several times, including for "<a href="The%20Concert%20Singer">The Concert Singer</a>".
